榪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mà］
［《廣韻》莫駕切，去禡，明。］
“杩1”的繁体字。
床头横木。
[②]［mǎ］
“杩2”的繁体字。
见“榪2子”、“榪2槎”。

榪字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榪； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页544第05
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?莫駕切，音罵。【玉篇】牀頭橫木也。【韻會】引《曾子·輿機疏》，機以木爲之，如牀，先用一繩繫著兩頭謂之榪。【正字通】俗謂木片關定器物曰榪子。

考證：〔【韻會】引曾子輿機疏，機以木爲之，如牀，先用以繩繫兩頭，謂之榪。〕　謹照原文以繩之以改一字。兩頭謂之榪改著兩頭之榪。

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　杩; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 544 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Do not drive, curse. [Jade articles] The bedside crosswood is also. [Yunhui] Quoting from "Zeng Zi·Yu Ji Shu", the machine is made of wood, like a bed, first with a rope tied at the two ends, called the 杩. [Zhengzitong] It is commonly said that wood chips Guanding utensils are called 杩子. Textual research: [[Yunhui] quoted Zeng Ziyu's machine, the machine is made of wood, like a bed, first with ropes at the two ends, which is called 杩杩. 〕　I would like to change the word according to the original text. The two ends are called 杩杩 change the two ends 杩杩.
